about_the_game:
Deception: Unveiling the Haunting Secrets

What is Deception?

Deception is not merely a game; it's an immersive dive into the realms of psychological horror, where players embark on a chilling journey through the forsaken corridors of an abandoned apartment, shrouded in mystery and laden with secrets waiting to be unearthed.

Experience the Unseen

Step into the shoes of a daring explorer, navigating the eerie confines of the deserted apartment, where every shadow conceals a sinister truth and every creaking floorboard echoes with the whispers of the past.

Thrills and Chills Await

Prepare yourself for an unparalleled gaming experience, where the line between reality and nightmare blurs, and the fear of the unknown grips your very soul. In Deception, you're not merely a spectator; you're an active participant in a spine-tingling tale of terror and intrigue.

Master the Art of Multitasking

In the heart-pounding gameplay of Deception, players must not only confront their deepest fears but also tackle the challenges of multitasking, as they navigate treacherous obstacles while unraveling the mysteries that lie within.

Dare to Discover

Are you ready to confront your darkest fears and unlock the secrets hidden within the walls of Deception? Prepare yourself for a journey into the unknown, where every step could lead to unimaginable horrors or breathtaking revelations. Enter if you dare...

name: Deception Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Experience the chilling depths of psychological horror in "Deception," as you navigate an abandoned apartment filled with secrets and sinister truths. Master multitasking as you confront unimaginable horrors and unearth breathtaking revelations in this spine-tingling tale of terror and intrigue.
